Header.Name: plotborderalpha
Header.Tooltip: Alpha for data plot border of this data-set

Header.Name: allowdrag
Header.Tooltip: Whether to allow the end users to drag the nodes belonging to this data-set

Header.Name: dataSetCallback
Header.Tooltip: Apply properties to nodes. The function needs one parameter that will receive the node properties

Header.Name: alpha
Header.Tooltip: Alpha for all the connectors on the chart.

Header.Name: arrowAtEnd
Header.Tooltip: Whether to show arrows at the end point of connectors

Header.Name: arrowAtStart
Header.Tooltip: Whether to show arrows at the origin of connectors

Header.Name: connectorColor
Header.Tooltip: Color for all the connectors on the chart

Header.Name: dashGap
Header.Tooltip: If the connectors are to appear as dashed, this attribute lets you define the gap between two consecutive dashes

Header.Name: dashLen
Header.Tooltip: If the connectors are to appear as dashed, this attribute lets you define the length of each dash

Header.Name: dashed
Header.Tooltip: Whether the connectors on the chart should appear as dashed

Header.Name: connectorCallback
Header.Tooltip: Apply properties to connectors. The function needs one parameter that will receive the connector properties

Header.Tooltip: Use the CDA Data as Markers or Data
